snippet.title: Burglar found flicking through magazines
snippet.content: A BOOKISH burglar has been arrested after a bizarre break-in at a Frankston home this morning. A 35-year-old woman woke to the intruder in her house in Fairway St and immediately fled and called police. Officers arrived to find the 27-year-old man casually flicking through magazines on the living room mantel piece. A struggled ensued after he resisted arrest and as a result, a police officer and the offender were injured. The Frankston man was taken to hospital with a minor facial injury and the police officer was also taken to hospital with a possible forearm injury. The Frankston man is expected to be interviewed later this morning.
